summary: Email correspondence between attorneys Alexandra Conlon (on behalf of Roberta Kaplan) and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a Touhy letter request for documents from the Department of Justice related to pending litigation against Jeffrey Epstein's estate. The email chain includes a previous message from the AUSA dated January 6, 2020.

keyFacts: Attorneys are engaged in pending litigation against Jeffrey Epstein's estate.
A Touhy letter request was made to the Department of Justice for documents related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence involves attorneys from Kaplan Hecker & Fink LLP and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email references a supporting exhibit from the case 'Doe v. Indyke et al., No. 19-cv-8673 (S.D.N.Y.)'.
The communication highlights ongoing legal efforts to obtain government documents concerning Epstein after his death.
